nodes.text: Parein II 4 was the Human-inhabited fourth moon of Parein II in the Sarin sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
It was the site of the Battle of Parein II 4, in which the forces of General Grievous defeated the Galactic Republic army of Colonel Tyneir Renz and General Sannen.[source?]
The native sweetgreen fruit, terrberries, and spicy nuts were used to make the alcohol known as daranu.[source?]
The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia lists the fourth moon of Parein II as uninhabited.
